name: Side Dumbbell Trunk Flexion
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your left side with your left arm in front of you for support and lift both legs away from the ground, keeping them straight.
2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.

3. Hold one light to medium weight (dumbbell) in your right hand and lift it off the ground, keeping your arm close to your body.

4. Press the dumbbells away from your left side, extending both arms as you lift your feet higher into the air.

5. Keep the rest of your body still, with only your legs, hips, and lower back performing the movement.

6. Slowly return the weights to their original position and repeat on the opposite side.
short_summary: Side dumbbell trunk flexion is an exercise that targets the muscles in your core, including your rectus abdominis, obliques, and transverse abs.
alternative_names: Cable Lateral Flexion with Dumbbell Support
